name: Brandon Cobb
text: Good, fairly priced pizza. Being able to see the entire process of creation to baking is a nice bonus, especially with those roaring flames. Garlic knots were cheesy and delicious as well. Over all, a good experience.

name: Rosa Garcia
text: Try the Bbq chicken pizza on a cauliflower crust and these dough knots are delicious.

name: Kaylyn Marlow
text: Blaze pizza has some of the best people working for them. They are all extremely funny, friendly, and helpful. They have excellent service and are as informative and honest as they can be. Watching how fast they move is phenomenal, …More

name: Kelsey Bullock
text: This place is great for family and friends! They have a great atmosphere and greet everyone who walks in with a smile. Their garlic knots a fantastic and their pizza is made exactly to your order right in front of you. My family loves this place so much.

name: Janara Grayson
text: This was our 1st time my son love pizza so he picked.  Great atmosphere Good customer service and the Pizza was very Good... If you haven't already been give them a try..

name: Jamie Horst
text: First time Blaze visit while we came to Tuscaloosa for the Alabama Football game and I will be sure to tell all my friends to stop here every time they come in for a game!! Amazing pizza and fast service!

name: Tiffany Strong
text: The Staff was very inviting and also very helpful for my first visit with a Blaze Pizza. I highly recommend this location and my friends and sorority will be back soon!

name: matt tanner
text: Best pizza I have had in a long time! Love the new Ghost Pepper pizza I was told to try!

name: Charles Parker
text: Music Banging, Pizza Rocking and Staff Amazing! Do not go anywhere else!! Calvin took great care of my family from the time we came in til we left! Highly recommend!

name: Lynda Olmstead
text: What could be more better than a pizza joint that allows you to choose what topping you want and how much? How about a pizza joint that does it right in front of you and some of the nicest employees around. Love blaze pizza (especially …More

name: Leslie powers
text: Staff was super inviting and very helpful! Fast, Hot food and will be back with my friends soon! Keep up the great work!

name: Maximilian Schalk
text: I used to eat here multiple times a week becuase it was so good. The quality has gotten a lot worse since the beginning of the year. I prefer frozen pizza over the last 2 times I went here.

name: Katelyn Schneider
text: Came in to get dinner (1 person) , told me it would be 45 minute wait while they made online orders..... why have your store front open for walk in if you’re only capable of fulfilling online orders. I find it very hard to believe they’re …More

name: Giovanni Nieves
text: Excellent customer service! The manager in shift, Calvin, went above and beyond to address my needs. Out of all that Blaze Pizzas I have been to, this one hands down has the best customer service. If you're here in T-Town and craving pizza then you should Roll Tide all the way down to this restaurant!

name: Z Cruz
text: Our pizza had insects in it(not sure of from the driver or the restaurant) and when we called they hung up on us twice, couldn’t get a manager and then told us our only recourse was to go to there help section online!!! NEVER GOING HERE AGAIN. DIDNT EVEN OFFER A DAMN COUPON

name: Parker sanford
text: Amazing Pizza! Best in T-Town by far!! Ill be back every week!

name: Marc Forbes
text: Pizza at this place - great. i love this place. the prices are well within reason for the quality.

name: John Parker
text: Great stop before the football game! RTR

name: Carrie Griffin
text: First off this review has nothing to do with the staff they were fantastic. However, I got the keto crust pizza today and I am extremely dissatisfied. This was not what people on a ketogenic diet should have to expect. I had been looking …More

name: Billy Phillips
text: They have vegan food. Its easier to find a gold needle in a hay stack with a few silver ones in there. The BBQ chicken pizza was so good the meat eater was also really good. It's not super filling which I enjoy because you dont feel bloated after eating a whole pizza.

name: Debbie Cierocke
text: Original sauce to spicy for me but otherwise pretty good

name: Glam Thomas
text: The pizza was so good n fresh with excellent service from a friendly staff!!! Good experience!

name: Christopher Johnson
text: I would have to say, Blaze Pizza has to be the best restaurant In Tuscaloosa that I have ever been to, hands down. Great toppings, great tasting and a nice staff. Would definitely recommend this place.

name: Rainy Dae
text: Loved the food. Nice people. Would recommend

name: Raina Perez
text: Great food and excellent service. Really appreciated the clean atmosphere

name: Adrian Childress
text: Restaurant was clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful will definitely be coming back in the near future Gabby and Hailey were amazing.

name: bj borq
text: Best Place to get Pizza in TusKlasooca.

name: George Benner
text: Unique urban environment, motivated, fast acting, and friendly staff, top notch management from Mr. Kent Boyd, and consistent high quality make this restaurant one of my favorites in town. Have gone probably over 40 times and have never been disappointed. I trust them enough to take a date here. 5 stars!

name: OEC Tuscaloosa
text: We make sushi and they make Pizza. dont go anywhere else!!!

name: Marilyn Barnhardt
text: Every time I go to blaze the staff is just as friendly as can be even if they are packed to the door. They also do an amazing job when taking my allergy into consideration. I have an allergy toward tomatoes and they make sure no tomato …More

name: lance roberts
text: Amazing food and service! Kills Pyros any day of the week!!!

name: Madaca 99
text: 5th Blaze in 4 states. Great chain... this one is still learning. Not bad,  but it's so hard to find the level of service in T-town that I see in other towns.  It wasn't bad here,  just used to seeing great enthusiasm at Blaze. The pizza is …More

name: Suzanne Morrow
text: The cauliflower crust is sooooooo good!

name: Thomas Koehle
text: Clean ‘n tidy location. Motivated and friendly staff. Menu like on all other BLAZE restaurants but offered by friendly people which makes the difference. Got the vegetarian Pizza and loved it. …More

name: harry johnson
text: Great Pizza!! We will return!

name: Kim Simmons
text: First and last time going into Blaze pizza the pizza was okay not all that the employees are so rude like they don’t have no care in the world. They had nasty nats flying everywhere I feel like they should be wearing hair nets. And at least have something covering up there food from the bugs. Do better please

name: Wren Thomley
text: Great food and amazing staff! Very friendly and extremely helpful!

name: Shontr Williams
text: It was ok..I didn't like the burnt crust at the bottom..but the lemonade was great

name: Mac Baker
text: Best tasting pizza in Tuscaloosa with fresh very high quality ingredients and toppings and the absolute best prices I've ever seen on handmade pizzas!

name: Really J
text: Don't come here expecting Domino's sized pizzas for Domino's prices. No, no, this place is a specialty pizza store that uses top quality ingredients to make a top quality pizzas. The trade off is, you're going to get a smaller pizza for a …More

name: Heather Lowery
text: This is located in Midtown next to Yogurt Mountain and Five Guys. When you walk in you go to your left to get in a line to order (like an assembly line). The employees are nice and helpful. The place is pretty clean. We've only gone with …More

name: Samantha Coley
text: Absolutely love this place. Best staff ever, super helpful and the pizza was delicious.

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Food is delicious and the staff is too notch! Amber always makes it an outstanding visit!!!

name: Michael Garner
text: Good taste. Fast service. Pizza price was a little high for what you get. Concrete floor.

name: Gary Jordan
text: Pizza is good. Price is okay. Service at the Tuscaloosa location is pathetically slow.  It as if lunch surprises them each time I go. Absolutely NO sense of urgency, regardless how many people are in line. So, if you have lots of time and …More

name: pamela tipton
text: Amazing Pizza and great service!!!

name: PAIGE T
text: I  have frequented other businesses in the Tuscaloosa area with this same business model, today my daughter decided she wanted to try Blaze since we hadn't been there yet... unimpressed is quite an understatement. When we walked in, having …More

name: Kay J
text: The workers were friendly and helpful and patient, as it was our first time visiting.  The pizza and salad were good!  Would definitely return.

name: Marvin Ingraham
text: Good atmosphere! My guys loved their lunch break

name: Sawyer Sherrill
text: Great experience, nice employees, and great food. You have a vast variety of options to your pizza to do whatever you want. And the signature pizzas are just as good.

name: Ann Castle
text: Love you can choose your own toppings and sauces making the pizza uniquely your own. Fired food. Great service

name: Jeremy Gamble
text: I love working at Blaze pizza Kent Boyd is the best Boss anybody could have. He really care about his employees.

name: Tally Robishaw
text: I have a severe dairy allergy and the build your own bar was really concerning because of cross contamination . But the blaze staff was so incredibly kind and willing to accommodate me and my allergy that I was able to eat stress free! …More

text:

text: Always fast, fresh and affordable. The staff is always friendly. Stays very clean.

name: Allen Martensen
text: My daughter told me about Blaze Pizza and I was traveling through Tuscaloosa AL and saw one of their store so decided to stop in for lunch.  Oh my, it was absolutely awesome. No chemicals, no preservatives, just fresh ingredients with dough …More

name: Jim Jones
text: Everyone in Tuscaloosa needs to go try Blaze pizza it is a great clean and friendly place they staff is very very helpful and patient if your ever having a bad day just go to Blaze keep up the good work guys me and my family will be back

name: Samantha Causey
text: Tried Blaze for the first time tonight. The set up of the store, pizza taste, and price are all very similar to Pyros Pizza. I tried the white pizza and it was good although I thought the pizza I usually get from pyros is a little better. …More

text: Beat pyros in my opinion. Bigger pizza and thicker crust. Fantastic

text: The only good wood fire pizza in Tuscaloosa - nothing is close.  They just need to fire most of the people that work their because it's like their autistic and just can't help being rude and indifferen't.

text: I'm not giving it a one star and ranting. "Meh. I've experienced better" describes our experience perfectly. The pizza is what you expect for the price; good but not amazing. Our mistake was that we placed an online order for bbq chicken …More
